entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sanirajak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:23 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -42.0°C

Observed at: Sanirajak (Hall Beach Airport) 12:00 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

Temperature: -42.0°C

Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 61 %

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 40.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 40. Wind chill near minus 59. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Temperature rising to minus 36 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 36 by morning. Wind chill minus 59 this evening and minus 54 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
